desc: Use buffer size of TIME microseconds
Use period size of TIME microseconds
Use number of periods.   The default value is 4
Specifies the number of loops.   Zero means to run infinitely
Do a single-shot speaker test for the given channel
Use the given WAV file for the playback instead of pre-defined WAV files
Specify the directory containing WAV files for playback
Pass the channel map to override
Allow supplied FREQ to be outside the default range of 30-8000Hz
